text.section: Each subsection of this section is subject to § 5-323 of this subtitle.

If the Department or Authority determines a project to be a significant strategic economic development opportunity, the Department or Authority may provide a loan from the Fund for the project to an individual, private business, not-for-profit entity, or the Corporation in an amount not exceeding $10,000,000.

If the Department or Authority determines a project to be a local economic development opportunity, the Department or Authority may provide financial assistance from the Fund for the project to an individual, private business, not-for-profit entity, or the Corporation in an amount not exceeding:
$5,000,000 for a loan or investment; and
$2,000,000 for a grant.

section.section:
Financial assistance provided to a local government or the Corporation to finance a project may be:
in the form of a grant, loan, or investment; and
except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, in an amount not exceeding $3,000,000.
Financial assistance for a qualified distressed county project may be in an amount determined by the Department.
A grant to a local economic development fund is subject to the requirements of Part V of this subtitle.

text.section:
Financial assistance for a specialized economic development opportunity may be:
provided to an individual, private business, not-for-profit entity, or local government, or the Corporation;
in the form of a grant, loan, or investment; and
in an amount determined by the Department or Authority.
